Posts.Content: I took Tamoxophin right after my radiation for 6 months and all my joints are in pain plus gain around 20 lbs. my doctor change from Tamoxophin to Arimidex for another few months still no improvement and he changed it again to Femera and nothing had change so I'm back to square one Tamoxophin. now I have to deal with joint pain specially my left wrist hurts so bad people say I might have carbotunalsymtom but I don't think so it's the pill that cause all these problem for me. I just want to quit taking it. can I???
Posts.Title: Tamoxophin

Posts.Content: I used to have nice long thick hair b4 chemo. I was done with radiation Aug 06 till now my hair is only 3 inches long center top straight. 10 inches in the back very curly and 15 inches on both side with a little curl. my hair now is so thin that I don't know what to do. I look so weird with this new hair I wish I can have my previous hair back. is anyone know anything about the eye lash? I still don't have any right now.
Posts.Title: hair regrowth after chemo
